name: claude-booking
description: Simple demo ai-generated application for restaurant booking
author: lilliputten@gmail.com

scripts.prettier: echo --Run prettier-- && prettier --write --cache . | grep -v -e cached -e unchanged || true
scripts.eslint-debug: echo --Lint sources with eslint in debug mode-- && cross-env DEBUG=eslint:cli-engine eslint --debug .
scripts.eslint-fix: echo --Lint and auto-fix sources with eslint-- && eslint --fix .
scripts.lint-all: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all eslint type-check stylelint && echo --All check-ups passed--
scripts.check-all: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all prettier lint-all && echo --All checks passed--
scripts.check-and-test: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all check-all test && echo --All checks and tests passed--
scripts.clear-all: echo --Clear all cache and temp files-- && rimraf node_modules/.cache .next && echo Cleared webpack and next cache
